name: Ultimate Arena - Demo
description:
Ultimate Arena is a battle royale simulator in which you are in charge of the stadium that your contestants play in. Create characters, new events, new dialogue, new music, and more to fill your library up with unique experiences.

If you'd like to, check out Ultimate Arena's Greenlight page on Steam. We'd appreciate your vote. http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=434032565
